00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /* USB Device descriptor setting                                                                            */
00050 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 // <h> USB Device descriptor setting
00052 //   <o0> USB Specification Release number (bcdUSB)
00053 //      <0x0200=> USB 2.0
00054 //      <0x0110=> USB 1.1
00055 //      <0x0100=> USB 1.0
00056 //   <o1> USB Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00057 //      <0x00=> Use class information in the Interface Descriptors (0x00)
00058 //      <0x02=> Communications and CDC Control (CDC, 0x02)
00059 //      <0xDC=> Diagnostic Device (0xDC)
00060 //      <0xEF=> Miscellaneous (0xEF)
00061 //      <0xFF=> Vendor Specific (0xFF)
00062 //   <o2> USB Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00063 //   <o3> USB Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF) <0x0-0xFF:1>
00064 //   <o4> USB Vendor ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00065 //   <o5> USB Product ID <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00066 //   <o6> USB Device Version <0x0-0xFFFF:1>
00067 //   <o7.0> USB String descriptor - Manufacturer
00068 //   <o8.0> USB String descriptor - Product
00069 //   <o9.0> USB String descriptor - Device serial number
00070 //   <o10> USB Number of possible configurations <0-255:1>
00071 #define DESC_BCDUSB               (0x0110)
00072 #define DESC_BDEVCLASS            (0xEF)
00073 #define DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS         (0x02)
00074 #define DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL         (0x01)
00075 #define DESC_IDVENDOR             (0x04D9)
00076 #define DESC_IDPRODUCT            (0x8008)
00077 #define DESC_BCDDEVICE            (0x0100)
00078 #define DESC_IMANUFACTURE         (1)
00079 #define DESC_IPRODUCT             (1)
00080 #define DESC_ISERIALNUM           (1)
00081 #define DESC_INUMCONFN            (1)
00082 // </h>
00083 
00084 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085 /* USB Device Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                         */
00086 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 #if (DESC_BDEVCLASS == 0x0 & DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS != 0x0)
00088 #error "DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS must be reset to zero when the DESC_BDEVCLASS is equal to zero."
00089 #endif
00090 #define DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0      (_EP0LEN)
00091 #define DESC_STR_MAN              (1 * DESC_IMANUFACTURE)
00092 #define DESC_STR_PRD              (2 * DESC_IPRODUCT)
00093 #define DESC_STR_SER              (3 * DESC_ISERIALNUM)
00094 #define DESC_NUM_STRING           (1 + 3)
00095 
00096 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /* USB Device descriptor                                                                                    */
00098 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_DeviceDesc[] =
00100 {
00101   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102   /* Device descriptor                                                                                      */
00103   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00105                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106   DESC_LEN_DEV,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00107   DESC_TYPE_01_DEV,           // bDescriptorType     1 DEVICE Descriptor Type
00108   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDUSB),      // bcdUSB              2 USB Specification Release Number
00109   DESC_BDEVCLASS,             // bDeviceClass        1 Class code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00110   DESC_BDEVSUBCLASS,          // bDeviceSubClass     1 Subclass code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00111   DESC_BDEVPROTOCOL,          // bDeviceProtocol     1 Protocol code (assigned by the USB-IF)
00112   DESC_WMAXPACKETSIZE0,       // wMaxPacketSize0     1 Maximum packet size for endpoint zero
00113   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDVENDOR),    // idVendor            2 Vendor ID (assigned by USB-IF)
00114   DESC_H2B(DESC_IDPRODUCT),   // idProduct           2 Product ID (assigned by manufacturer)
00115   DESC_H2B(DESC_BCDDEVICE),   // bcdDevice           2 Device release number
00116   DESC_STR_MAN,               // iManufacturer       1 Index of string descriptor (Manufacturer)
00117   DESC_STR_PRD,               // iProduct            1 Index of string descriptor (Product)
00118   DESC_STR_SER,               // iSerialNumber       1 Index of string descriptor (Serial Number)
00119   DESC_INUMCONFN,             // iNumConfigurations  1 Number of possible configuration
00120 };
00121 
00122 
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 /* USB Configuration descriptor setting                                                                     */
00125 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 // <h> USB Configuration descriptor setting
00127 //   <o0.0> Self-powered
00128 //     <i> Bit 6 of bmAttributes
00129 //   <o1.0> Remote Wakeup
00130 //     <i> Bit 5 of bmAttributes
00131 //   <o2> USB Device maximum power (mA) < 2-512:2>
00132 #define DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER        (0)
00133 #define DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP     (0)
00134 #define DESC_BMAXPOWER                (250)
00135 // </h>
00136 
00137 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 /* USB Configuration Descriptor definition. DO NOT MODIFY.                                                  */
00139 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00140 #define DESC_W2B(Val)            ((u8)(Val & 0x000000FF)), ((u8)((Val & 0x0000FF00) >> 8)), ((u8)((Val & 0x00FF0000) >> 16)), ((u8)((Val & 0xFF000000) >> 24))
00141 #define DESC_BMATTRIBUTES        (0x80 | (DESC_BMATTR_SELF_POWER << 6) | (DESC_BMATTR_REMOTE_WAKEUP << 5))
00142 
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 /* USB Configuration Descriptor                                                                             */
00145 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_ConfnDesc[] =
00147 {
00148   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00149   /* Configuration descriptor                                                                               */
00150   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00151                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00152                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153   DESC_LEN_CONFN,             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00154   DESC_TYPE_02_CONFN,         // bDescriptorType     1 CONFIGURATION Descriptor Type
00155   DESC_H2B(DESC_LEN_CONFN_T), // wTotalLength        2 Total length of data returned for this configuration
00156   0x02,                       // bNumberInterface    1 Number of interfaces supported by this configuration
00157   0x01,                       // bConfigurationValue 1 Value to use as an argument to the SetConfiguration()
00158   0x00,                       // iConfiguration      1 Index of string descriptor describing this configuration
00159   DESC_BMATTRIBUTES,          // bmAttributes        1 Configuration characteristics
00160                               //                        D6: Self-powered, D5: RemoteWakeup
00161   DESC_POWER(DESC_BMAXPOWER), // bMaxPower           1 Maximum power consumption of the USB device (2 mA units)
00162 
00163   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00164   /* Interface Association descriptor                                                                       */
00165   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00167                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00168   IAD_LEN_INF,                // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00169   0x0B,                       // bDescriptorType     1 Interface association descriptor
00170   0x00,                       // bFirstInterface     1 Interface number of the first VideoControl
00171   0x02,                       // bInterfaceCount     1 Number of contiguous VideoStreaming
00172   0x0E,                       // bFunctionClass      1 CC_VIDEO
00173   0x03,                       // bFunctionSubClass   1 SC_VIDEO_INTERFACE_COLLECTION
00174   0x00,                       // bFunctionPrtocol    1 PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED
00175   0x02,                       // iFunction           1 Index of a string descriptor
00176 
00177   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00178   /* Standard VC Interface descriptor                                                                       */
00179   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180                                 /* Field            Size Description                                        */
00181                                 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00182     DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLengthI            1 Size of this descriptor in bytes (9)
00183     DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorTypeI    1 INTERFACE descriptor type (4->Interface)
00184     0x00,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of interface (Zero-based 0)
00185     0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select alternate setting (0)
00186     1,                          // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints use by this interface (1)
00187     COMMUNICATION_INF_CLASS,    // bInterfaceClass     1 Class code (2)
00188     COMMUNICATION_INF_SUBCLASS, // bInterfaceSubClass  1 Subclass code (2:abstract control model)
00189     COMMUNICATION_INF_PTCO,     // bInterfaceProtocol  1 Protocol code (1:AT commands)
00190     0x02,                       // iInterface          1 Index of string descriptor (Interface) (0 means no support)
00191 
00192   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00193   /* Class-specific VC Interface descriptor  VC_Header                                                      */
00194   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00195                                    /* Field            Size Description                                     */
00196                                    /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00197   UVC_LEN_INF,                     // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 12 + n
00198   CS_INTERFACE,                    // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00199   0x01,                            // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VC_HEADER
00200   DESC_H2B(0x0100),                // bcdUVC              2 Revision of class specification
00201   DESC_H2B(VC_TotalLength),        // wTotalLength        2 Total size of class-specific VideoControl interface
00202   DESC_W2B(DESC_CLOCK_FREQUENCY),  // dwClockFrequency    4 the device clock frequency in Hz.(15 MHz)
00203   0x01,                            // bInCollection       1 Number of VideoStreaming interfaces
00204   0x01,                            // baInterfaceNr(1)    1 VideoStreaming interface 1
00205 
00206   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00207   /* input Terminal descriptor                                                                              */
00208   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00209                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00210                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00211   IT_LEN,                     // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 8 + n
00212   CS_INTERFACE,               // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00213   0x02,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VC_INPUT_TERMINAL
00214   IT_ID,                      // bTerminalID         1 ID of this input terminal
00215   DESC_H2B(0x0201),           // wTerminalType       2 COMPOSITE_CONNECTOR
00216   0x00,                       // bAssocTerminal      1 ID of Output Terminal, 0 -> no association
00217   0x00,                       // iTerminal           1 Index of string descriptor
00218   0x00,
00219   0x00,
00220   0x00,
00221   0x00,
00222   0x00,
00223   0x00,
00224   0x03,
00225   0x00,
00226   0x00,
00227   0x00,
00228 
00229   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230   /* Output Terminal descriptor                                                                             */
00231   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00232                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00233                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00234   OT_UNIT_LEN,                // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 9 + n
00235   CS_INTERFACE,               // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00236   0x03,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VC_OUTPUT_TERMINAL
00237   OT_ID,                      // bTerminalID         1 ID of this input terminal
00238   DESC_H2B(0x0101),           // wTerminalType       2 TT_STREAMING
00239   0x00,                       // bAssocTerminal      1 ID of Input Terminal, 0 -> no association
00240   PU_ID,                      // bSourceID           1 Input pin of this unit is connected
00241   0x00,                       // iTerminal           1 Index of string descriptor
00242 
00243   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00244   /* Processing Unit descriptor                                                                             */
00245   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00246                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00247                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00248   PU_LEN,                     // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 10 + n
00249   CS_INTERFACE,               // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00250   0x05,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VC_PROCESSING_UNIT
00251   PU_ID,                      // bUnitID             1 ID of this unit
00252   IT_ID,                      // baSourceID          1 ID of t this unit is connected
00253   DESC_H2B(0x0190),           // wMaxMultiplier      2 Digital Multiplier control is not support
00254   0x02,                       // bControlSize        1 Size of bmControls field
00255   DESC_H2B(0x0001),           // bmControls          2 Mentioned control is supported for the video stream
00256   0x00,                       // iProcessing         1 Index of a string descriptor
00257 
00258   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00259   /* Standard Interrupt Endpoint descriptor                                                                 */
00260   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00262                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00263   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 7
00264   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT
00265   0x81,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 IN Endpoint 1
00266   0x03,                       // bmAttributes        1 Must be set 0x03 Interrupt
00267   DESC_H2B(0x0008),           // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00268   0x09,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint for data transfer
00269 
00270   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00271   /* Class-specific Interrupt Endpoint descriptor                                                           */
00272   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00273                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00274                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00275   UVC_LEN_EPT,                // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 5
00276   CS_ENDPOINT,                // bDescriptorType     1 CS_ENDPOINT
00277   0x03,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 EP_INTERRUPT
00278   DESC_H2B(0x0008),           // wMaxTransferSize    2 Maximum interrupt structure size
00279 
00280   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00281   /* Standard VS Interface descriptor                                                                       */
00282   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00283                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00284                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00285   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 9
00286   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE
00287   0x01,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of interface
00288   0x00,                       // bAlternateSetting   1
00289   0x00,                       // bNumEndpoint        1 Number of endpoints used by this interface
00290   CC_VIDEO,                   // bInterfaceClass     1 CC_VIDEO
00291   SC_VIDEOSTREAMING,          // bInterfaceSubClass  1 SC_VIDEOSTREAMING
00292   PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED,      // bInterdaceProtocol  1 PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED
00293   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of a string descriptor
00294 
00295   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00296   /* Class-specific VS Header descriptor                                                                    */
00297   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00298                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00299                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00300   VS_HEADER_LEN,              // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 13 + (p * n)
00301   CS_INTERFACE,               // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00302   0x01,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VS_INPUT_HEADER
00303   0x01,                       // bNumFormats         1 Number of video payload format descriptors
00304   DESC_H2B(VS_TotalLength),   // wTotalLength        2 Total number of bytes returned for the class-specific
00305   0x84,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 IN endpoint 4
00306   0x00,                       // bmInfo              1
00307   OT_ID,                      // bTerminalLink       1 Output Terminal of this interface is connected
00308   0x02,                       // bStillCaptureMethod 1 Method 2 select
00309   0x01,                       // bTriggerSupport     1 hardware triggering is support
00310   0x00,                       // bTriggerUsage       1 Initiate still image capture
00311   0x01,                       // bControlSize        1 Size of each bmaControls(x) field
00312   0x00,                       // bmaControls(1)      1
00313 
00314   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00315   /* Class-specific VS Format descriptor                                                                    */
00316   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00317                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00318                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00319   VS_FORMAT_LEN,              // bLength             1
00320   CS_INTERFACE,               // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00321   0x04,                       // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VS_FORMAT_UNCOMPRESSED
00322   0x01,                       // bFormatIndex        1 Index of this format descriptor
00323   0x01,                       // bNumFrameDescriptor 1 Number of frame descriptor
00324   0x59, 0x55, 0x59, 0x32,     // guidFormat          16
00325   0x00, 0x00, 0x10, 0x00,
00326   0x80, 0x00, 0x00, 0xAA,
00327   0x00, 0x38, 0x9B, 0x71,
00328   0x10,                       // bBitsPerPixel       1 Number of bits per pixel
00329   0x01,                       // bDefaultFrameIndex  1 Optimum Frame Index
00330   0x00,                       // bAspectRatioX       1 The X dimension of the picture aspect ratio
00331   0x00,                       // bAspectRatioY       1 The Y dimension of the picture aspect ratio
00332   0x00,                       // bmInterlaceFlags    1
00333   0x00,                       // bCopyProtect        1 0: No restrictions
00334 
00335   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00336   /* Class-specific VS Frame descriptor                                                                     */
00337   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00338                                     /* Field            Size Description                                    */
00339                                     /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00340   VS_FRAME_LEN,                     // bLength             1
00341   CS_INTERFACE,                     // bDescriptorType     1 CS_INTERFACE
00342   0x05,                             // bDescriptorSubtype  1 VS_FRAME_UNCOMPRESSED
00343   0x01,                             // bFrameIndex         1 Index of this frame descriptor
00344   0x00,                             // bmCapabilities      1 D0: Still image support set
00345                                     //                       D1: Fixed frame-rate set
00346   DESC_H2B(DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH),       // wWidth              2 Width of decoded bitmap frame in pixels
00347   DESC_H2B(DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT),      // wHeight             2 Height of decoded bitmap frame in pixels
00348   DESC_W2B(DESC_IMAGE_MINBITRATE),  // dwMinBitRate        4 Minimum bit rate at the longest frame interval in units of bps
00349   DESC_W2B(DESC_IMAGE_MAXBITRATE),  // dwMaxBitRate        4 Maximum bit rate at the longest frame interval in units of bps
00350   DESC_W2B(DESC_FRAME_BUF_SIZE),    // dwMaxVideoFrameBufferSize
00351   DESC_W2B(DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL),    // dwDefaultFrameInterval
00352   0x01,                             // bFrameIntervalType
00353   DESC_W2B(DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL),
00354 
00355   /*0x06,                       //bFrameIntervalType
00356   0x15, 0x16, 0x05, 0x00,  // 30 Hz
00357   0x20, 0xA1, 0x07, 0x00,  // 20 Hz
00358   0x2A, 0x2C, 0x0A, 0x00,  // 15 Hz
00359   0x40, 0x42, 0x0F, 0x00,  // 10 Hz
00360   0x80, 0x84, 0x1E, 0x00,  // 5 Hz
00361   0x80, 0x96, 0x98, 0x00,  // 1 Hz*/
00362 
00363 
00364   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00365   /* VS_Still_Image descriptor                                                                              */
00366   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00367                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00368                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00369   VS_STILL_ILEN,
00370   CS_INTERFACE,
00371   0x03,
00372   0x00,
00373   0x01,
00374   DESC_H2B(DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH),
00375   DESC_H2B(DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT),
00376   0x00,
00377 
00378   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00379   /* VS_Color_Format descriptor                                                                             */
00380   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00381                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00382                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00383   VS_COLOR_FORMAT_LEN,
00384   CS_INTERFACE,
00385   0x0d,
00386   0x01,
00387   0x01,
00388   0x04,
00389 
00390   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00391   /* Standard VS Interface descriptor                                                                       */
00392   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00393                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00394                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00395   DESC_LEN_INF,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor, 9
00396   DESC_TYPE_04_INF,           // bDescriptorType     1 INTERFACE
00397   0x01,                       // bInterfaceNumber    1 Number of interface
00398   0x01,                       // bAlternateSetting   1 Value used to select alternate setting
00399   0x01,                       // bNumEndpoints       1 Number of endpoints use by this interface
00400   CC_VIDEO,                   // bInterfaceClass     1 CC_VIDEO
00401   SC_VIDEOSTREAMING,          // bInterfaceSubClass  1 SC_VIDEOSTREAMING
00402   PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED,      // bInterdaceProtocol  1 PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED
00403   0x00,                       // iInterface          1 Index of a string descriptor
00404 
00405   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00406   /* Standard VS Isochronous Video Data Endpoint descriptor                                                 */
00407   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00409                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00410   DESC_LEN_EPT,               // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00411   DESC_TYPE_05_EPT,           // bDescriptorType     1 ENDPOINT Descriptor Type
00412   0x84,                       // bEndpointAddress    1 The address of the endpoint
00413                               //                        Bit 3..0: The endpoint number
00414                               //                        Bit 6..4: Reserved
00415                               //                        Bit 7   : Direction (0 = Out/1 = In)
00416   0x05,                       // bmAttribute         1 Endpoint Attribute
00417                               //                        Bit 1..0: Transfer type
00418                               //                                  00 = Control
00419                               //                                  01 = Isochronous
00420                               //                                  10 = Bulk
00421                               //                                  11 = Interrupt
00422                               //                        All other reserved
00423   DESC_H2B(_EP4LEN),          // wMaxPacketSize      2 Maximum packet size
00424   0x01,                       // bInterval           1 Interval for polling endpoint
00425 };

00429 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00430 __ALIGN4 static uc8 guUSB_StringDescLANGID[] =
00431 {
00432   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00433   /* LANGID (Index = 0)                                                                                     */
00434   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00435                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00436                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00437   DESC_STRLEN(1),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00438   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00439   DESC_H2B(0x0409),           // wLANGID[0]          2 LANGID code zero
00440 };

00485 
00486 
00487 #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00488 __ALIGN4 static u8 guUSB_StringDescSerialNum[] =
00489 {
00490   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00491   /* Serial Number (Index = 3)                                                                              */
00492   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00493                               /* Field            Size Description                                          */
00494                               /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00495   DESC_STRLEN(9),             // bLength             1 Size of this descriptor in bytes
00496   DESC_TYPE_03_STR,           // bDescriptorType     1 STRING Descriptor Type
00497   DESC_CHAR('S'),             // bString             N UNICODE encoded string
00498   DESC_CHAR('N'),
00499   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00500   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00501   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00502   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00503   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00504   DESC_CHAR('0'),
00505   DESC_CHAR('4'),
00506 };
00507 #endif
00508 
00509 uc8 *gpStringDesc[DESC_NUM_STRING] =
00510 {
00511 
00512   guUSB_StringDescLANGID,
00513 
00514   #if (DESC_IMANUFACTURE == 1)
00515   guUSB_StringDescManufacture,
00516   #else
00517   NULL,
00518   #endif
00519 
00520   #if (DESC_IPRODUCT == 1)
00521   guUSB_StringDescProduct,
00522   #else
00523   NULL,
00524   #endif
00525 
00526   #if (DESC_ISERIALNUM == 1)
00527   guUSB_StringDescSerialNum
00528   #else
00529   NULL,
00530   #endif
00531 
00532 };
00533 
00534 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00535   * @brief  USB Descriptor pointer initialization.
00536   * @param  pDesc: pointer of USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef
00537   * @retval None
00538   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00539 void USBDDesc_Init(USBDCore_Desc_TypeDef *pDesc)
00540 {
00541   pDesc->pDeviceDesc = guUSB_DeviceDesc;
00542   pDesc->pConfnDesc = guUSB_ConfnDesc;
00543   pDesc->ppStringDesc = gpStringDesc;
00544   pDesc->uStringDescNumber = DESC_NUM_STRING;
00545 
00546   return;
00547 }
00548

00551   * @}
00552   */

00555   * @}
00556   */

00559   * @}
00560   */
